name: Doodle Bullets
description:
Doodle Bullets

A Game where you try to survive bullet filled rounds!
Every round you get 10$ and you can spend them in the shop buying stuff like artifacts, hearts and shields!
artifacts make the game a lot easier and you will probably need atleast a few until round 15 which is the last round of the game!

W A S D or Arrows = Moving
E or X = Buying Items
F or Space = Using the shield

Post your score in the comments and ill reply to it!

Note that this game has been very rushed due to me going on vacation the next day, don't expect this game to be bug free and perfect!
